body_html: To expand on @kvnull : we had similar issues in our company. The biggest problem is that the nightly builds are for some reason built with the non-default "-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0". For us it is thus impossible to link against the pre-built libtorch binaries, because our software was built with the default (CXX11_ABI=1). The only solution was to build pytorch from source, making sure that flag is set to 1.

body: To expand on @kvnull : we had similar issues in our company. The biggest problem is that the nightly builds are for some reason built with the non-default "-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0". For us it is thus impossible to link against the pre-built libtorch binaries, because our software was built with the default (CXX11_ABI=1). The only solution was to build pytorch from source, making sure that flag is set to 1.
